content.html: Mastercard rules 5.12.3: A Merchant must not require, or indicate that it requires, a minimum or maximum Transaction amount to accept a valid and properly presented Mastercard or Maestro Card. (hey @MastercardEU looks like @berlinairport are breaking your rules)

Mastercard rules 5.12.3:
